name: ExternalDatabaseAuth
author: Wolfgang Hochleitner
description: An extension to allow authentication against an external MySQL/MariaDB database

ExternalDatabaseAuthDatabase.description: Connection details for the external database, that stores the login information.

ExternalDatabaseAuthFields.description: Information about the table and the field names that store the information about the users

ExternalDatabaseAuthHash.description: Tells the extension the hashing algorithms that was used with your passwords. Accepts the following: bcrypt, argon2i, argon2id (which will use password_verify) or any string value supported by PHP's hash() function.
